mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MED_NOPAY_DELIVER ( group_id, hos_id, copy_code, deliver_id, deliver_no, origin_no , year, month, sup_id , sup_no , store_id, store_no, brief, stocker, stock_type_code , maker , in_date , state , checker , check_date , confirmer , confirm_date , protocol_code , app_dept , proj_id ) VALUES ( #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliver_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliver_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sup_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sup_no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{store_no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stocker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock_type_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_date(#{in_date,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd'), 1 , #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{check_date,jdbcType=DATE} , #{confirmer,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{confirm_date,jdbcType=DATE} , #{protocol_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{app_dept,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{proj_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select:
SELECT mndd.group_id, mndd.hos_id, mndd.copy_code, mndd.deliver_id, mndd.deliver_no, mndd.detail_id, mndd.inv_id, mndd.inv_no, mndd.batch_no, mndd.price, mndd.amount, mndd.amount_money, mndd.sale_price, mndd.sale_money, mndd.sell_price, mndd.sell_money, mndd.pack_code, mndd.num_exchange, mndd.pack_price, mndd.num, mndd.bar_code, mndd.inva_date, mndd.disinfect_date, mndd.location_id, mndd.note ,mid.is_bar , mid.is_per_bar , mnd.sup_id , mnd.sup_no , hsd.sup_name FROM MED_NOPAY_DELIVER_D mndd left join med_inv_dict mid ON mndd.group_id = mid.group_id and mndd.hos_id = mid.hos_id and mndd.copy_code = mid.copy_code and mndd.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mndd.inv_no = mid.inv_no left join MED_NOPAY_DELIVER mnd ON mndd.group_id = mnd.group_id and mndd.hos_id = mnd.hos_id and mndd.copy_code = mnd.copy_code and mndd.deliver_id = mnd.deliver_id and mndd.deliver_no = mnd.deliver_no LEFT JOIN hos_sup_dict hsd on mnd.group_id = hsd.group_id and mnd.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and mnd.sup_id = hsd.sup_id
and hsd.is_stop = 0 WHERE mndd.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mndd.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mndd.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mndd.deliver_id = #{deliver_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mndd.deliver_no = #{deliver_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT mnd.group_id, mnd.hos_id, mnd.copy_code, mnd.deliver_id, mnd.deliver_no, mnd.origin_no , mnd.year, mnd.month , mnd.sup_id, mnd.sup_no, hsd.sup_name, mnd.store_id, mnd.store_no, hsc.store_name, mnd.brief, mnd.stocker, he.emp_name as stocker_name, mnd.stock_type_code , mst.stock_type_name , mnd.confirmer , hed.emp_name as confirmer_name, mnd.confirm_date, mnd.maker, su.user_name as maker_name, mnd.in_date, mnd.checker, syu.user_name as checker_name , mnd.check_date, mnd.state , mnd.protocol_code , mpm.protocol_name, mnd.app_dept, hdd.dept_code, hdd.dept_name, mnd.proj_id , hpd.proj_code , hpd.proj_name , t.amount_money FROM MED_NOPAY_DELIVER mnd LEFT JOIN (select deliver_id , sum(amount_money) amount_money from med_nopay_deliver_d where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} group by deliver_id ) t ON mnd.deliver_id = t.deliver_id LEFT JOIN hos_store_dict hsc on mnd.group_id = hsc.group_id and mnd.hos_id = hsc.hos_id and mnd.store_id = hsc.store_id and mnd.store_no = hsc.store_no and hsc.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN hos_dept_dict hdd on mnd.group_id = hdd.group_id and mnd.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and mnd.app_dept = hdd.dept_id and hsc.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN med_stock_type mst ON mnd.group_id = mst.group_id and mnd.hos_id = mst.hos_id and mnd.copy_code = mst.copy_code and mnd.stock_type_code = mst.stock_type_code and hdd.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user su on mnd.group_id = su.group_id and mnd.hos_id = su.hos_id and mnd.maker = su.user_id LEFT JOIN hos_emp_dict hed on mnd.group_id = hed.group_id and mnd.hos_id = hed.hos_id and mnd.confirmer = hed.emp_id LEFT JOIN sys_user syu on mnd.group_id = syu.group_id and mnd.hos_id = syu.hos_id and mnd.checker = syu.user_id LEFT JOIN hos_sup_dict hsd on mnd.group_id = hsd.group_id and mnd.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and mnd.sup_id = hsd.sup_id and mnd.sup_no = hsd.sup_no LEFT JOIN hos_emp he on mnd.group_id = he.group_id and mnd.hos_id = he.hos_id and mnd.stocker = he.emp_id LEFT JOIN MED_PROTOCOL_MAIN mpm on mnd.group_id = mpm.group_id and mnd.hos_id = mpm.hos_id and mnd.copy_code = mpm.copy_code and mnd.protocol_code = mpm.protocol_code LEFT JOIN hos_proj_dict hpd on mnd.group_id = hpd.group_id and mnd.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and mnd.proj_id = hpd.proj_id WHERE mnd.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mnd.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mnd.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mnd.deliver_id = #{deliver_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mnd.deliver_no = #{deliver_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
UPDATE med_nopay_deliver_d
inv_id = #{item.inv_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_no = #{item.inv_no,jdbcType=INTEGER},
batch_no = #{item.batch_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_sn = #{item.batch_sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{item.price,jdbcType=FLOAT},
amount = #{item.amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_money = #{item.amount_money,jdbcType=FLOAT},
sell_price = #{item.sell_price,jdbcType=FLOAT},
sell_money = #{item.sell_money,jdbcType=FLOAT},
sale_price = #{item.sale_price,jdbcType=FLOAT},
sale_money = #{item.sale_money,jdbcType=FLOAT},
pack_code = #{item.pack_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num_exchange = #{item.num_exchange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pack_price = #{item.pack_price,jdbcType=FLOAT},
num = #{item.num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bar_code = #{item.bar_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inva_date = #{item.inva_date,jdbcType=DATE},
disinfect_date = #{item.disinfect_date,jdbcType=DATE},
location_id = #{item.location_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{item.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE group_id = #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deliver_id = #{item.deliver_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and detail_id = #{item.detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: SELECT a.deliver_id, a.deliver_no, a.year, a.month, b.store_name, c.sup_name, a.brief, d.user_name maker, to_char(a.in_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') in_date, e.user_name checker, to_char(a.check_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') check_date, f.user_name confirmer, to_char(a.confirm_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') confirm_date, g.emp_name stocker, h.stock_type_name, i.protocol_name, j.dept_name app_dept, k.proj_name, sum(l.amount_money) money_sum, sum(l.amount_money) money_sum_upper FROM med_nopay_deliver a LEFT JOIN med_nopay_deliver_d l ON a.group_id = l.group_id AND a.hos_id = l.hos_id AND a.copy_code = l.copy_code AND a.deliver_id = l.deliver_id LEFT JOIN hos_store_dict b ON a.group_id = b.group_id AND a.hos_id = b.hos_id AND a.store_id = b.store_id AND a.store_no = b.store_no LEFT JOIN hos_sup_dict c ON a.group_id = c.group_id AND a.hos_id = c.hos_id AND a.sup_id = c.sup_id AND a.sup_no = c.sup_no LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.group_id = d.group_id AND a.hos_id = d.hos_id AND a.maker = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user e ON a.group_id = e.group_id AND a.hos_id = e.hos_id AND a.checker = e.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user f ON a.group_id = f.group_id AND a.hos_id = f.hos_id AND a.confirmer = f.user_id LEFT JOIN hos_emp_dict g ON a.group_id = g.group_id AND a.hos_id = g.hos_id AND a.stocker = g.emp_id AND g.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN med_stock_type h ON a.group_id = h.group_id AND a.hos_id = h.hos_id AND a.copy_code = h.copy_code AND a.stock_type_code = h.stock_type_code LEFT JOIN med_protocol_main i ON a.group_id = i.group_id AND a.hos_id = i.hos_id AND a.copy_code = i.copy_code AND a.protocol_code = i.protocol_id LEFT JOIN hos_dept_dict j ON a.group_id = j.group_id AND a.hos_id = j.hos_id AND a.app_dept = j.dept_id AND j.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN hos_proj_dict k ON a.group_id = k.group_id AND a.hos_id = k.hos_id AND a.proj_id = k.proj_id AND k.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.deliver_id = #{paraId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.deliver_id, a.deliver_no, a.year, a.month, b.store_name, c.sup_name, a.brief, d.user_name, a.in_date, e.user_name, a.check_date, f.user_name, a.confirm_date, g.emp_name, h.stock_type_name, i.protocol_name, j.dept_name, k.proj_name

SELECT a.deliver_id as id, a.deliver_id, a.deliver_no, a.year, a.month, b.store_name, c.sup_name, a.brief, d.user_name maker, to_char(a.in_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') in_date, e.user_name checker, to_char(a.check_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') check_date, f.user_name confirmer, to_char(a.confirm_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') confirm_date, g.emp_name stocker, h.stock_type_name, i.protocol_name, j.dept_name app_dept, k.proj_name, sum(l.amount_money) money_sum, sum(l.amount_money) money_sum_upper FROM med_nopay_deliver a LEFT JOIN med_nopay_deliver_d l ON a.group_id = l.group_id AND a.hos_id = l.hos_id AND a.copy_code = l.copy_code AND a.deliver_id = l.deliver_id LEFT JOIN hos_store_dict b ON a.group_id = b.group_id AND a.hos_id = b.hos_id AND a.store_id = b.store_id AND a.store_no = b.store_no LEFT JOIN hos_sup_dict c ON a.group_id = c.group_id AND a.hos_id = c.hos_id AND a.sup_id = c.sup_id AND a.sup_no = c.sup_no LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON a.group_id = d.group_id AND a.hos_id = d.hos_id AND a.maker = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user e ON a.group_id = e.group_id AND a.hos_id = e.hos_id AND a.checker = e.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user f ON a.group_id = f.group_id AND a.hos_id = f.hos_id AND a.confirmer = f.user_id LEFT JOIN hos_emp_dict g ON a.group_id = g.group_id AND a.hos_id = g.hos_id AND a.stocker = g.emp_id AND g.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN med_stock_type h ON a.group_id = h.group_id AND a.hos_id = h.hos_id AND a.copy_code = h.copy_code AND a.stock_type_code = h.stock_type_code LEFT JOIN med_protocol_main i ON a.group_id = i.group_id AND a.hos_id = i.hos_id AND a.copy_code = i.copy_code AND a.protocol_code = i.protocol_id LEFT JOIN hos_dept_dict j ON a.group_id = j.group_id AND a.hos_id = j.hos_id AND a.app_dept = j.dept_id AND j.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN hos_proj_dict k ON a.group_id = k.group_id AND a.hos_id = k.hos_id AND a.proj_id = k.proj_id AND k.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.deliver_id in (${paraId}) GROUP BY a.deliver_id, a.deliver_no, a.year, a.month, b.store_name, c.sup_name, a.brief, d.user_name, a.in_date, e.user_name, a.check_date, f.user_name, a.confirm_date, g.emp_name, h.stock_type_name, i.protocol_name, j.dept_name, k.proj_name ORDER BY a.deliver_id desc
